pages.text: Tsey khto vvazhayutʹ, ta ne zabrudnyuyutʹ yikhnyu viru z idolom obozhnyuyutʹ, zasluzhyly doskonalu bezpeku, ta vony spravdi keruyutʹsya
Takyy nash arhument, z kotrym my pidtrymaly Abraham proty yoho lyudey. My exalt whomever my budemo vyshche vyshykuyetʹsya. Vash Lord ye Naybilʹsh Mudryy, Omniscient

Ta my harantuvaly yomu Isaac ta Jacob, ta my kerovani obydva z nykh. Analohichno, my kerovani Noah pered shcho, ta z yoho nashchadkiv (my kerovani) David, Solomon, Robota, Joseph, Moses, ta Aaron. My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Takozh, Zachariah, Dzhon, Isus, ta Elias; vesʹ spravedlyvyy
Ta Ismail, Elisha, Jonah, ta Dolya; kozhnyy z tsykh my rozriznyly nad vsima lyudʹmy
Z chysla yikhnikh predkiv, yikhni nashchadky, ta yikhni siblings, my vybraly bahato, ta my keruvaly nymy u pryamomu shlyakhu
Takyy BOZHE kerivnytstvo, z kotrym Vin keruye whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho sluzhbovtsiv. Budʹ-yaki yim vpaly u idolatry, yikhni pratsi buly by znyshcheni
Tsey yavlyaly soboyu komu my daly svyate pysannya, wisdom, ta prophethood. Yakshcho tsi lyudy disbelieve, my zaminymo inshi u yikhnʹomu mistsi, ta novi lyudy ne budutʹ disbelievers
Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu keruyuchysʹ BOHOM; vy povynni keruvatysya u yikhnikh krokakh. Skazhitʹ, "ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty. Tse ale povidomlennya dlya vsikh lyudey
